ygData.subject: Re: Oracle Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You could do that even better with a regular char, no reason to make a level 1. In fact, it s safer, because a level 35 warrior can hold off the 40 pally
ygData.messageBody:
SPRUSBRUCE@... wrote:
>
> From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
>
> We made a level 1 charecter and buffed him up to 200hp then gave him spirit
> of the cheetah and he ran him around then we killed oracel quick looted and
> we evaced it was a very good way to kill him.
>

You could do that even better with a regular char, no reason to make a
level 1. In fact, it's safer, because a level 35 warrior can hold off
the 40 pally longer than the newbie who would die after 3 - 4 hits
(assuming SOC runs out or some other blunder).

--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
Even drones can fly away
The queen is their slave
